request.description:
This endpoint is used to generate and send a one-time password (OTP) to the user's email address. It returns a JSON Web Token (JWT) that holds the encrypted OTP to preserve the state thoughout the validation process.

## Request Body

| Name | Type | **Required** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `email` | `string` | Yes | The email address to which the OTP will be sent. |

## Response

| Name | Type | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `success` | `boolean` | Indicates if the request was successful. |
| `token` | `string` | The JWT holding the encrypted OTP. |

This endpoint is used to generate and send a one-time password (OTP) to the user's phone number. It returns a JSON Web Token (JWT) that holds the encrypted OTP to preserve the state thoughout the validation process.

## Request Body

| Name | Type | **Required** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `phoneNumber` | `string` | Yes | The phone number to which the OTP will be sent. |

## Response

| Name | Type | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `success` | `boolean` | Indicates if the request was successful. |
| `token` | `string` | The JWT holding the encrypted OTP |

This endpoint is used to validate a one-time password (OTP) against a JSON Web Token (JWT) that holds the encrypted OTP.

## Request Body

| Name | Type | **Required** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `token` | `string` | Yes | JWT holding the encrypted OTP. |
| `otp` | `string` | Yes | The OTP to be validated. |

## Response

| Name | Type | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `success` | `boolean` | Indicates if the request was successful. |
| `valid` | `boolean` | Shows if the OTP and the encrypted OTP from the token match. |
